lead_paragraph: REISMAN--Marvin. It is with great sorrow that we announce the passing of Marvin Reisman at the age of 87 at West Boca Medical Center on July 3, 2016. Marvin, loving husband of 61 years to Sally Reisman. Cherished father and father-in-law of Marci and Michael Pomerantz and Allison and Peter Menkes. Devoted grandfather of Michaelan and Zhak Cohen, Sean and Sunny Menkes, Matthew, Jack, and Lianne Menkes. Marvin was formerly of Armonk, NY, and Manhattan. He was born in Brooklyn, NY on November 10, 1928 to Samuel and Anna Reisman. He graduated from Brooklyn College and Brooklyn Law School and became a founding partner of the law firm of Budin, Reisman, Kupserberg, and Bernstein. Marvin leaves a legacy of family love and respect, and the joy of living life to its fullest. A graveside service will be held on Sunday, July 10th, at 11am at Sharon Gardens Cemetery, 273 Lakeview Ave., Valhalla, NY 10595. In lieu of flowers, donations can be made in his memory to the Chiera Family Foundation, which helps send young cancer patients to summer camp and college. www.chierafamilyfoundation .org, or the Marvin Reisman Memorial Fund in Toronto at Baycrest.org/give or 416-785-2875. 1/3
